attributes.action: Ignore the request to hold a 2nd EU Referendum vote.
attributes.additional_details: Time will tell whether the change brought is beneficial or not to our newly independent nation.
attributes.background: Britain needs to stop spitting their dummies out and accept the results obtained. We are a strong Nation and always have been and can face whatever the future holds as a united front. If we are faced with endless problems another referendum should be considered but not until at least 4 years later.
